description: **hledger** is cross-platform accounting software for both power users and folks new to accounting. It's good for tracking money, time, investments, cryptocurrencies, inventory and more. It is an actively maintained, largely compatible reimplementation of Ledger CLI with a particular focus on **ease of use** and **robustness**.
summary: hledger is cross-platform accounting software for both power users and folks new to accounting. It's good for tracking money, time, investments, cryptocurrencies, inventory and more.
author: Simon Michael
